detail_desc: Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Twill linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Twill linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Oversized, straight-cut jacket in imitation leather with a collar, covered press-studs down the front, a chest pocket and patch front pockets. Lined.
Trainers in mesh, imitation leather and imitation suede with reflective details and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in mesh, imitation leather and imitation suede with reflective details and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a padded jersey tongue, shimmering metallic heel caps and a patent back section. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Set with a dress and leggings in cotton. Dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a yoke, long sleeves with concealed elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Patterned jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Set with a dress and leggings in cotton. Dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a yoke, long sleeves with concealed elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Patterned jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Trainers in mesh with details in imitation leather, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a decorative lacing detail around the heel. Grosgrain loops front and back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.

Trainers in mesh with details in imitation leather, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a decorative lacing detail around the heel. Grosgrain loops front and back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, pattern-knit wool and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a cable-knit wool and cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a cable-knit wool and cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered top in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a gathered section at the front. Lined.
Platform trainers with imitation suede and imitation leather details. Padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 6.5 cm.
Platform trainers with imitation suede and imitation leather details. Padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 6.5 cm.
Shirt jacket in a felted wool blend with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pocket with a press-stud and adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. Unlined.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants. Adjustable length, 44-51 cm and 50-58 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with covered elastication at the sides and decorative tabs and buckles. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Platform ankle boots in imitation suede with and elastic shaft. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 6.5 cm.
Body in soft lace with a straight cut at the top, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps and a string back.
Body in soft lace with a straight cut at the top, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps and a string back.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbed details and inset mesh sections. High waist with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional yarn with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional yarn with elasticated tops.

Sports bag in woven fabric with two wide handles at the top. Drawstring at the top and two shoulder straps which mean the bag can be carried as a backpack. Large outer compartment with a press-stud and a small inner compartment. Double-layered. Width 39 cm. Height 45 cm.

Sports bag in woven fabric with two wide handles at the top. Drawstring at the top and two shoulder straps which mean the bag can be carried as a backpack. Large outer compartment with a press-stud and a small inner compartment. Double-layered. Width 39 cm. Height 45 cm.
Push-up bras in soft jersey and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a grandad collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a grandad collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.

Sports top in fast-drying mesh with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Sports top in fast-drying mesh with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Sports vest top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and decorative seams at the sides. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sports vest top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and decorative seams at the sides. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Athletic Fit – a fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest with a tapered waist to create a comfortable, modern silhouette.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Athletic Fit – a fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees with tapered legs and narrow hems to create a comfortable, modern silhouette.
Long jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with a high, stand-up collar, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Calf-length wrap dress in chiffon crêpe with short butterfly sleeves and a V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Seam and narrow ties at the waist, and a pleated skirt. Lined.

Tuxedo trousers in woven fabric with zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with satin stripes down the sides and creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Shoulder bag in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Zip and adjustable shoulder strap at the top, an outer compartment with an elastic drawstring at the top and a concealed hook and loop fastening, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 8x34x50 cm.

Shoulder bag in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Zip and adjustable shoulder strap at the top, an outer compartment with an elastic drawstring at the top and a concealed hook and loop fastening, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 8x34x50 cm.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back. Gathered side seams for best fit over the tummy, and a rounded hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.

Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Short, high-waisted skirt in stretch velour. Visible zip at the front with a round tab decorated with sparkly stones.

Short, wide parka woven in a cotton blend with a slight sheen. High collar, large hood with a peak and drawstring, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Seam at the waist with a loose yoke, diagonal flap side pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Long dolman sleeves with a hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer a the back. Lined.

Short, wide parka woven in a cotton blend with a slight sheen. High collar, large hood with a peak and drawstring, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Seam at the waist with a loose yoke, diagonal flap side pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Long dolman sleeves with a hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer a the back. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs.
Metal and plastic earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 3 cm to 7.5 cm.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a two-part shoulder strap on one shoulder. Jersey lining.
Large shopper in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 16.5x30x30 cm.
Large shopper in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 16.5x30x30 cm.
Boxy-style jumper in a fluffy jacquard knit with a turtle neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hair clips decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 7.5 cm.
Jacket in imitation suede with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Jacket in imitation suede with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Top in soft pile with a kangaroo pocket and hood with an elastic drawstring. Long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Top in soft pile with a kangaroo pocket and hood with an elastic drawstring. Long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms in fast-drying functional fabric with medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms in fast-drying functional fabric with medium coverage at the back.
